FAQ

Answers to the most common questions

Can I use OctoPi with different trading platforms and exchanges?

Yes, OctoPi is designed to be compatible with various trading platforms and exchanges. You can seamlessly integrate OctoPi with your preferred trading platform to automate your trades and take advantage of its features across different exchanges.
